metadata.task_intro: task planning, long term task decomposition

task_instance.task_description: Create four identical gift baskets by combining four sets of candles, four sets of cookies, four pieces of cheese, and four bows on the tables.
Please take the strawberry and peach from the refrigerator to the table, slice them with the knife on the table, and put them in two separate jars
Pack all the books into the box
Place the wooden boards next to the refrigerator
Please brush the lint off clothing and then put the clothing on bed

Please take out the dish from the cabinet and proceed to slice two mushrooms, two tomatoes, two chestnuts, and two onions on the table using a knife. The mushrooms, tomatoes, and chestnuts are on the table, while the onions are in the refrigerator. After slicing, transfer them into the dish.
Please clean the car. First, put the soap on the shelf into the bucket, and then use the rag on the shelf to wipe the car
Please wet the rag next to the toilet in the bathroom and clean the barbecue grill with it
Please clean the bathroom with a wet brush
Please clean the bathtub with the brush inside it

Please clean the bedroom. Put the 2 apparels on the bed into the cabinet, put the jewelry and perfume on the floor into the cabinet, put the sheet on the floor onto the bed, put the painting on the bed onto the sheet, and use the hand towel to clean the dusty cabinets
Please clean up stains on the carpets with a wet hand towel
Please clean all the closets
Please clean the cupboard and the nightstand. Put the 2 markers in the cupboard into the bucket, and take out one book from the nightstand and two books from the cupboard.
Please clean the floors with the scrub brush next to the broom on the floor
Please clean the freezer with the rag next to the sink
Please clean and tidy the garage
Please clean the high chair
Please wet the rag next to the sink, use it to clean the two cabinets above the microwave, and then put the bowls on the tables into the cabinets
Please clean the microwave with a wet rag
Please place the items from both cabinets near the sink
Please clean the oven
Please clean the shoes
Please clean the sneakers with the towel on the countertop, and put them under the table after cleaning
Please clean the stove with the rag from the cabinet
Please clean the table with the towel next to the sink
Please clean the stain on th hot tub with a wet scrub brush on the floor
Please clean the pool with the scrub brush on the floor
Please clean the toilet with the scrub brush on the floor
Please clean up after a meal. Put all the hamburgers in the sack, clean the stain on the chiars, table, and tableware.
Please wet the the rag next to the sink and clean up the refrigerator
Please clean up the kitchen. The kitchen floor and closet are a bit dirty
Please clean the windows with the rag in the cabinet
Please put everything on the table into the bucket
Please collect misplaced items onto the dining table, including necklace in the cabinet, 2 socks on the sofa and floor, a sneaker on the dining room floor, and a notebook under the dining table
Please collect all the aluminum cans into the bucket
Please defrost the freezer with the scraper on the countertop
Please fill the Christmas stocking with pens and candies from the cabinet
Please put eggs in the refrigerator and bows in the cabinet into each basket
Please put the fax machine on the table, and open it
Please put the modem onto the floor
Please put the printer onto the table and open it
Please open the scanner and put it onto the floor
Please put the alarms onto the dining-table
Please lay the tile floors for the bathroom
Please lay the wooden floors near the sofa
Please load the dishwasher
Please close all the doors
Please lock every window
Please make tea. Note that there is no water or tea in the teapot. You can go to the sink to collect water and go to the cabinet to get the tea bag
Please use the cloth on the toilet floor to mop the floor
Please move both the boxes to storage and stack them
Please open these packages
Please open these presents
Please place the two balls on the garage floor, the three plates on the shelf, and saucepan into the carton on the floor
Please organize the file cabinet. Make sure the marker is on the table, the documents and folders are in the cabinet.

Please put my backpack onto the bed and put school stuff into it, including a highlighter, a pencil, a pen on the bed, and the calculator on the floor. And put the 2 folders and a book next to my backpack.
Please help me pack the makeups, toothbrush, and mouse on the bed and the necklace under the bed into my bag
Put the underwares, toothbrush, shampoo, hardback, and toothpaste on the bed into the backpack
Please put the shirts, and sweater on the ground and the three books on the table into the carton
Please pack the car for a trip. I need the pencil box and headset on the countertop, and the briefcase and duffel bag on the ground
Please help pack a child's backpack. The child needs a pair of sunglasses, a notebook, a bracelet, an apple, and an earphone.
Please help me pack food for work into the box. I would like snacks from the cabinet, juice, an apple, and a sandwich

Pack two packs of potato chips in the cabinet, juice and soda on the table, hamburger and salad in the refrigerator, apple, banana, and two cookies on the countertop into two cartons, ensuring that each carton contains potato chips and cookies. The salad and burger cannot be placed in the same carton, and so does the apple and banana.

Put the two packs of potato chips, four bottles of water in the cabinet, four hamburgers on the table, and four strawberries, four grapes, two peaches, two cans of soda, one bottle of beer in the refrigerator into the carton
Place the box containing takeout on the table
Throwing garbage
polish the table and the shelf
Wipe off stains on shoes with the rag on the floor
Wipe the 4 spoons in the cabinet with the rag in the cabinet, and then place the spoons back in the cabinet
prepare a shower for child
Please prepare two salads with tomatoes, radishes, apples, and lettuce
Put the beef on the table into the refrigerator, slice two strawberries with the knife on the table, put them in the pot, heat them in the oven, and finally put them in the jar
Put Christmas decorations in the drawer
Put the caldron on the floor next to the table, put the 2 pumpkins and 3 candles on the floor in the cabinet
Put the toys in the box
Put the 4 plates on the countertop into the cabinet
Put the 4 pastes and 4 cans of sauce on the table into the refrigerator
Put all the gifts on the ground under the Christmas tree, put all the candles, wreaths, and one bow in the box on the table, and put the other two bows on the sofa
Put the books on the table on the bookshelf
Place two lights by the door and window respectively, place the chair on the bed by the window, and then place the other chair by the bed
Take out the food from the refrigerator and prepare tableware
Place a piece of parsley on every cheeses, and put the salads next to the cracker on the table, and finally put the tray on the floor on the table
setting mousetraps on the floor
There are three sets of candles in each of the two cartons. Please place three sets of candles on the tables in the living room and dining room respectively
Put the books on the table and floor on the shelf
Send the food on the table and countertop to the refrigerator
Stack the envelopes and newspapers separately into a pile
Pack all the food (2 boxes of oatmeal, 2 bags of chips, 2 bottles of oil, 2 sugars) on the countertop into the cabinet
Please store the groceries. Put the 2 boxes of cereal on the table into the cabinet below, and put the other items on the table (2 broccoli, 2 lettuce, 2 pork, 2 raspberries) into the refrigerator
Thaw the frozen food on the countertop next to the sink
Throw the hamburger into the trash can
Put the 2 socks, perfume, toothbrush, notebook in the box onto the sofa
Clean the floor with the vacuum cleaner.
Clean the car with the rag on the car. The rag should be wet before cleaning
Clean the dishes on the countertop with the rag.
Please wet the towel on the bathroom floor and wash the floor, including bathroom floor, bedroom floor, and living room floor
Clean the pots and pans on the countertop with the rag, and put them into the cabinet.
Water the plant
Wipe the car with the rag on the shelf
